page.title: 05A FARMER'S DAY I
page.content: This is how a farmer spends a day in Cummertrees.There are markets on a Tuesday and a Friday.The markets aren't far from Cummertrees,just about five miles away in Annan. They sell cows and bullocks and calves on a Tuesday and sheep and lambs on a Friday. In the morning around 6.00 am we start milking the cows and feeding the calves, then about seven o'clock the cows get let out, then it is usually time for breakfast.After breakfast the odd jobs are done ,such as putting calves out ,mixing up the cow feed for the cows at night and other small jobs.
